company.description: Bringing quality products to your doorstep since 2024. We believe in sustainable commerce and exceptional customer service.

pending.title: Email Verification Pending
pending.message: An email has been sent to {email}. Please check your inbox to activate your account.
pending.check_spam: If you don't see the email, please check your spam folder.
pending.resend_cooldown_message: Please wait 1 minute before trying again.

activation.success_message: Your account has been successfully activated. You can now log in to your account.
activation.failure_message: There was an issue activating your account. Please try again.

signup.error_username_taken: A user with that username already exists.
signup.error_email_taken: A user is already registered with this email address.
signup.error_generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
signup.check_spam: If you don't see the email, please check your spam folder.

validation.username_min: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.password_min: Password must be at least 12 characters
validation.password_number: Password must contain at least 1 number
validation.password_lowercase: Password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter
validation.password_uppercase: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter
validation.password_special: Password must contain at least 1 special character

validation.newPassword_min: Password must be at least 12 characters
validation.newPassword_number: Password must contain at least 1 number
validation.newPassword_lowercase: Password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter
validation.newPassword_uppercase: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter
validation.newPassword_special: Password must contain at least 1 special character

passwordReset.title: Reset Password
passwordReset.email_sent_message: We've sent a password reset link to your email. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions.
